courses.title: MBBS
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery
courses.description: MBBS is a professional undergraduate program in medical science. It prepares students for medical practice and patient care.

courses.title: BAMS
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery
courses.description: BAMS is an undergraduate degree in Ayurvedic medicine and surgery, focusing on ancient Indian medical practices.

courses.title: BDS
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Dental Surgery
courses.description: BDS is a professional dental degree that prepares students for careers in dentistry and oral health care.
colleges: Maulana Azad Institute of Dental Sciences

courses.title: BHMS
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery
courses.description: BHMS focuses on homeopathic medicine and its application in treating various diseases, blending modern and traditional treatments.
colleges: Dr. BR Sur Homeopathic Medical College

courses.title: MBA
courses.subtitle: Master of Business Administration
courses.description: MBA is a graduate-level program that focuses on business management and administration. It prepares students for leadership roles in business.

courses.title: PGDM
courses.subtitle: Post Graduate Diploma in Management
courses.description: PGDM is a diploma course in management that provides practical and theoretical knowledge to advance careers in business management.

courses.title: Bsc Nursing
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
courses.description: BSc Nursing is a course aimed at providing quality education in nursing to help students care for patients and improve healthcare delivery.
colleges: All India Institute of Medical Sciences

courses.title: BSc Fashion
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Science in Fashion Designing
courses.description: BSc Fashion is a degree course in fashion designing that prepares students for a career in the fashion industry, focusing on creativity and design techniques.

courses.title: LLB
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Law
courses.description: LLB is an undergraduate degree in law, preparing students for careers in the legal profession, including courts, firms, and corporate sectors.

courses.title: B Pharm
courses.subtitle: Bachelor of Pharmacy
courses.description: B Pharm is an undergraduate program that prepares students for careers in the pharmaceutical industry, including drug research and production.

courses.title: MCA
courses.subtitle: Master of Computer Applications
courses.description: MCA is a postgraduate degree in computer applications that provides students with advanced knowledge of programming, software development, and IT management.

courses.title: Aeronautical
courses.subtitle: Aeronautical Engineering
courses.description: Aeronautical Engineering involves the design and development of aircraft and spacecraft. This degree provides the technical knowledge required in the aerospace industry.
